titleStmt.title: An ordinance presented to the Honorable House of Commons, by Mr. Bacon, a lawyer in Suffolk, and Mr Taet, both of them members of the same house, and by their means was twice read, and referred to a committee For the preventing of the growing and spreading of heresies.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Nathaniel, 1593-1660.
Taet, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "10 sept: London. 1646".
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
